mapper.sql: id, applyDateStr, orderNumber, orderNum, applyDataId, areaType, tczf, ryDate, cyDate, fzCode, fzName, zyzdCode, zyzdName, zssCode, zssName, qtzdCode, qtzdName, qtssCode, qtssName, deptName, areaId, areaName, qz, kzrDocId, kzrDocName, zrysDocId, zrysDocName, zzysDocId, zzysDocName, zyysDocId, zyysDocName, ylzDeptName, ylzDocId, ylzDocName
mapper.select: SELECT jk.* FROM yb_drg_jk jk inner join yb_drg_apply_data dad on jk.applyDataId = dad.id where dad.pid = #{pid}
